actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to eliminate the existing exemption for labor, agricultural, and horticultural organizations.

summary.text: Repeals the existing exemption, under the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956, of bank holding companies which are labor, agricultural, or horticultural organizations, from the prohibition under such Act of ownership or control by bank holding companies of any company which is not a bank and which engages in activities other than banking.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Bank Holding Company Act of 1956 to eliminate the existing exemption for labor, agricultural, and horticultural organizations.
